EVE_CALLBACK.description: The URL to use as a redirect after the EVE SSO logs in the user, that has also been set in the EVE application configuration.

EVE_DELIVERIES_SESSION_SECRET.description: A cryptographically secure secret for the cookie system to use. Yes, you need to set it yourself, yes it needs to be cryptographically secure.

EVE_ID.description: The EVE ID to use to communicate with the EVE API, obtained from the EVE application creation process.

EVE_SECRET.description: The EVE Secret to use to communicate with the EVE API, obtained from the EVE application creation process.

MYSQL_CONNECTION_LIMIT.description: The maximum number of connections to create at once.

MYSQL_DATABASE.description: Name of the database to use for the connection.

MYSQL_HOST.description: The hostname of the database you are connecting to.

MYSQL_LOCAL_ADDRESS.description: The source IP address to use for TCP connection.

MYSQL_PASSWORD.description: The password of that MySQL user.

MYSQL_PORT.description: The port number to connect to.

MYSQL_SOCKET_PATH.description: The path to a unix domain socket to connect to. When used host and port are ignored.

MYSQL_USER.description: The MySQL user to authenticate as.

NODE_ENV.description: Defines the current environment (set to dev in a development environment or leave empty).

PORT.description: The port the application will use.
